data.title: Ben Moody on LinkedIn: Local businesses come to the rescue after vandals target Darlington School
data.meta_description: Was gutted to hear about this last Friday - Proud to be part of a business that supports its community üëç
data.text:
What is Real T Simplistic's mission? Thoughtful Senior and Specialty Moves. üóÉÔ∏è Sometimes, the process of decluttering, moving, and reorganizing can seem daunting. Real T specializes in organization, donations, estate sales, and the general overview of the moving process. If you need assistance with your home's upkeep, we offer practical services such as mowing, snow removal, house maintenance, and cosmetic fixes such as painting, landscaping, and generic cleaning. From start to finish, we want to ensure a stress-free transition, no matter the circumstances. üì¶ Learn more about what we can do for you at www.thoughtfulmoves.com.

üå≥ Doylestown Township Parks Improvement Project! üå≥ Join us on an exciting journey as we embark on a transformative mission to enhance our beloved Central Park! This video provides an look at the Doylestown Township Capital Campaign, a dedicated effort to improve Central Park for everyone to enjoy. üîπ What's Included in the Project? - Community Recreation Center: Indoor Recreation and Gathering Spaces. - New Outdoor Sports Courts: Basketball, Bocce, Pickleball, and Tennis Courts. - Permanent & Accessible Restrooms near the Amphitheater and Kids Castle. üîπ Why Your Support Matters: The success of this campaign relies on the support of our community. Your contributions will help us create a more vibrant and welcoming environment for everyone to enjoy. Every donation, big or small, brings us one step closer to making this vision a reality. üîπ Play a Part at Central Park: Be a Donor, Be a Sponsor, Leave Your Legacy, Help Build the CRC - Donate: Learn how you can contribute to the campaign. - Volunteer: Discover volunteer opportunities and ways to get involved. - Spread the Word: Share this video with friends and family to raise awareness. üåü Thank You for Your Support! üåü Together, we can improve Central Park and continue its legacy for generations to come.

"Clean out of your house" means to remove or eliminate all items or individuals from a house, typically as part of a thorough decluttering or eviction process. **Definition:** To clean out of your house refers to the action of removing or evicting all belongings or individuals from a residence, often to declutter, renovate, or vacate the premises. **Examples:** 1. They had to clean out their house after deciding to downsize and move to a smaller place. 2. The landlord cleaned out the tenants who had not paid rent for several months. 3. She cleaned out her deceased parents' house, sorting through years of accumulated possessions. 4. The family cleaned out their garage to convert it into a home gym. 5. The city government cleaned out abandoned houses to prevent squatting and vandalism. 6. After the flood, they had to clean out their basement of damaged furniture and belongings. 7. The organization cleaned out their storage unit to make space for new donations. 8. The couple cleaned out their attic to find valuable antiques hidden among old boxes. 9. He cleaned out his home office to create a more productive workspace. 10. The volunteers cleaned out the animal shelter to prepare for new rescues. **Synthesis:** Cleaning out of your house involves a comprehensive process of sorting, removing, and sometimes disposing of items or individuals from a residence to achieve a specific goal such as renovation, relocation, or organization. **Hashtags:** #CleanOut #HouseCleaning #Decluttering #MovingDay #HomeOrganization

We keep such an eye on tech and charity news over at Uprise Up | B Corp and we thought it was about high time we started sharing it with you! So without further ado - snippets we think you should know about from the last two weeks... üí° Tech news - Google has finished its switch over to mobile-first indexing, prioritising mobile versions of sites over desktop. - Performance Max has evolved, adding new themes, though Uprise Up still urges caution using the tool. - YouTube rolled out a major update improving user experience and adding an intuitive new ‚Äòyou‚Äô tab ‚Äì consolidating users' account and library pages. ü§ù Charity news - Last month‚Äôs data breach at a subcontractor of ‚ÄòAbout Loyalty‚Äô has hit multiple major charities. - NVCO The National Council for Voluntary Organisations has warned a fifth of charities could disappear this winter due to the ‚Äòcost-of-giving‚Äô crisis. üòÄ Just good news - The International Energy Agency (IEA) reported that they expect that half the world's electricity will be provided by renewable sources by the end of the decade. - Cancer Research UK (CRUK) has funded a study that has seen remarkable results for cervical cancer, using existing drugs before chemoradiation treatment, which appears to have reduced the risk of death or cancer returning reduced by 35% - Volunteers, including schoolchildren, have rediscovered a historic stag made of boulders in Aberdeenshire after five years of hard work removing weeds and debris from the site. https://lnkd.in/ecyixKTg Want more updates? More news snippets? More joy? Sign up to the Uprise Up newsletter! https://lnkd.in/ehHSWTXq
